name: Lost In The Woods (Sam_Vart)
description:
Submission to the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.

Controls:

- WASD to move.  

- Mouse to Aim, LMB to Shoot.

- Space Bar to Pick-Up and Deposit wood.

You are lost in the woods you must keep the fire going as you will die if you stray too long from it if it goes out.

Beware of the wolves. 

Good Luck!

____

All Art and Code written by myself.

SFX found on freesound.org
